pageContext.claim: “We don't have a Tariff problem (we are reigning in bad and/or unfair players), we have a Fed problem. They don't have a clue!”
pageContext.analysis: Most economists blame Trump's trade war with China for slowing down U.S. economic growth, hurting the agricultural and manufacturing sectors especially and raising costs on U.S. consumers. Virtually all the money collected by Trump's China tariffs has been used to subsidize U.S. farmers, who have been shunned by China in retaliation for Trump's trade moves.
